status_legend.0: Normal Operation - The turbine is in normal power production mode
status_legend.1: Derated Operation - Derated power generation with a power restriction
status_legend.2: Idling - Asset is idling and waits to operate again
status_legend.3: Service - Asset is in service mode / service team is at the site
status_legend.4: Downtime - Asset is down due a fault or other reasons

summary: Across the 6‑hour window the turbine stayed in Normal Operation for all 37 ten‑minute intervals, with very stable power output near rated (power_mean 0.9755, power_std 0.0002) despite moderate variability in wind (mean 18.19, std 1.14) and at least one high‑wind spike (max 33.6). Rotor speed was essentially constant (rotor_rpm_std 0.0) while generator speed showed small variation (std 0.672), alongside a relatively high average pitch setting (15.46) and a persistent yaw misalignment around 9.40°. Anomalies/pattern flags during this period were high wind, elevated temperatures (temp_mean 70.59), and a consistently negative power residual on average (-0.1401).
